model.name: LV Initials Taurillon Illusion 40MM Reversible Belt
model.disambiguatingDescription: This LV Initials Taurillon Illusion 40mm Reversible Belt exemplifies the House's fine craftsmanship and adventurous spirit. The double-sided strap features an embossed Monogram pattern with a spray effect that creates a contemporary look. Plain calf leather covers the reverse side, while the iconic LV Initials buckle completes this versatile accessory.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Width: 4 cm/1.6 inches
  • Blue/Pink
  • Taurillon Illusion leather on front
  • Plain calf leather on reverse
  • Silver-colour hardware
  • All-over embossed Monogram pattern
  • Double spray effect finish
  • LV Initials buckle
